root.name: Lemmings
root.description: OverviewThe most recent iteration of the Lemmings franchise, developed by Team 17 for the PSP. As with the other games, it tasks the player with guiding a horde of mindless lemmings though various treacherous levels by assigning them various abilities to help the reach the designated exit.In December 2012, a port of the game by d3t Ltd. was released as a freemium title on PlayStation Mobile. It adds touch controls, and provides the first 30 levels free, with the rest as paid DLC.

similar_games.game: Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Mini-Land Mayhem
